heading: Choose Your Focus
paragraph: Select a habit you want to cultivate throughout the year. Whether it's daily exercise, mindfulness, or any positive change, HueTrack is here to support your journey.

heading: Customize with Labels
paragraph: Personalize your habit tracking experience by creating labels that represent different aspects or states of your chosen habit. Attach vibrant colors to each label, making your progress tracking visually delightful.

heading: Calendar View
paragraph: Navigate through our intuitive calendar view where each day is a canvas for your progress. Simply tap on any day to mark your commitment, cycling through the colors associated with your chosen labels.

heading: Statistics
paragraph: Track your journey with insightful statistics and celebrate your milestones. Witness the evolution of your habits over time.
